args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Let z âˆˆ â„‚ with |z| < 1. Then |log(1 - z)| â‰¤ âˆ‘_{n=1}âˆ |z|^n/n â‰¤ |z|/(1-|z|). -/
theorem abs_log_one_sub_le_tsum {z : â„‚} (hz : abs z < 1) :
  abs (log (1 - z)) â‰¤ âˆ‘' n : â„•, (abs z)^(n+1) / (n+1 : â„) âˆ§
  âˆ‘' n : â„•, (abs z)^(n+1) / (n+1 : â„) â‰¤ abs z / (1 - abs z) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let z âˆˆ â„‚ with |z| < 1. Then |log(1 - z)| â‰¤ âˆ‘_{n=1}âˆ |z|^n/n â‰¤ |z|/(1-|z|). -/
theorem abs_log_one_sub_le_tsum (z : Complex) (hz : Complex.abs z < 1) :
  Complex.abs (Complex.log (1 - z)) â‰¤ âˆ‘' n : â„•, (Complex.abs z)^(n + 1) / (n + 1 : â„) âˆ§
  âˆ‘' n : â„•, (Complex.abs z)^(n + 1) / (n + 1 : â„) â‰¤ Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z) := by sorry
